HomePage.title: About Me
HomePage.intro: I'm a creative and versatile developer with a strong passion for building beautiful, high-performance websites, mobile apps, and full-stack solutions. With expertise in modern technologies and a growing interest in AI, I design and develop impactful digital experiences that drive business success. I stay continuously informed on tech trends to ensure that every project I lead blends innovation, technical precision, and real-world value.

experience.title: Developer fullstack @ Capgemini
experience.description: Contributed to strategic projects for EDF, Luxembourg government, and internal R&D, covering fullstack web and mobile development, system architecture, and automation using Python, Java EE, Vue, React, and Swift/Kotlin.

experience.title: Developer fullstack mobile @ Zémus
experience.description: Worked as a fullstack mobile developer on innovative projects using React Native and Python, handling end-to-end development from design to deployment on both Android and iOS.

list.name: EDF
list.description: Redesigned part of EDF’s information system in an Agile environment by building a modular architecture with Python microservices and Docker. Led the end-to-end automation of document workflows (PDF/Word generation, email, SFTP to NAS) and developed a ReactJS interface for business users. Managed full-cycle development from needs gathering to delivery, including CRON-based automation, improving system scalability and reliability.

list.name: Ministry of Luxembourg
list.description: Project for the Luxembourg government involving the development of a security clearance platform for individuals seeking residency. Built with Java EE, Vue.js, and PostgreSQL, the system processed sensitive personal data, requiring robust encryption to ensure confidentiality. I was responsible for developing complete use cases end-to-end, from backend logic to frontend integration.

list.name: Intern project for Capgemini
list.description: Designed and developed a cross-platform native mobile application (iOS in Swift, Android in Kotlin) integrated with an AI model built using TensorFlow. The app allowed real-time data collection, secure transmission to a Python-based backend, and dynamic feedback based on AI inference results. I led the full implementation of the mobile-to-AI communication pipeline, including authentication, data formatting, API design, and result handling, bridging mobile UX with machine learning capabilities in production-grade environments.

list.name: Wikipedia
list.description: Project developed in partnership with Wikipedia: an innovative mobile app using React Native and Flask that helps users discover nearby historical landmarks via geolocation and SPARQL queries to Wikidata. I led the entire development, from design to publishing on Android and iOS app stores.

list.name: Other Projects
list.description: In addition to my professional experience, I actively work on personal projects, including developing crypto trading bots using the Binance API, and creating a mobile game currently under development. I am also deeply interested in AI, dedicating significant time to learning and experimenting with various models and technologies. Exploring a career in AI is something I am highly passionate about and eager to pursue.
